title: Ticket #5887: Allow node retry delay
description:
The Pegasus people want to be able to have a delay between retries of a given node. One possibility is to have a fixed exponential delay, as we have for submit failures. Another possibility is to allow something like a ClassAd expression to be specified that defines the delay.

Still in the process of clarifying things a bit -- more info should be coming.
